page.title: 04Whittington Community Centre
page.content: The present{Community Centre}used to be the village school.It was opened in 1978 and has played an important part in village life since then.There are many village organisations that use the Community Centre.One important organisation is the{Playgroup}for children of pre-school age.They meet every school day from 9-11.30a.m. with 18-20 children each session.Children usually start at the age of three but can be admitted at two if a doctor or education officer advises it.During each session the children have an opportunity of play with a wide variety of apparatus and games.Adult helpers are paid Â£1.00 a session and work on a rota basis.The Community Centre is also used by many other village organisations for adults and children.
